text: Hingga troh watee Kamoe bri balah Bak dapu raya beureutoh bagah Kamoe kheun taba meupasang-pasang Inong ngon agam mantong tapeuglah Ngon ahli gata pih bandum taba Meulengkan nyang ka teukeudi Allah Ureueng meuiman pih bandum taba Padum droe sahja nyang na got tuah Nyang laen bandum hana meuiman
